faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers about our audio ducking feature

items.title: What types of audio can be enhanced with ducking?
items.description: Our audio ducking feature works effectively with music tracks, podcasts, voiceovers, and any sound recordings containing overlapping elements.

items.title: Is there a limit to how many files I can process?
items.description: No! Process as many files as you need. Each user enjoys unlimited enhancements with our responsive system.

items.title: Can I use the enhanced audio for commercial projects?
items.description: Yes! All users can utilize their processed audio for commercial or personal projects without restrictions.

items.title: How secure is my audio during the processing?
items.description: Your files are solely processed within your browser, ensuring they remain confidential and are not stored or transmitted elsewhere.
